text: Collect Night Sight From Table To Begin

Activate The Night Sight
Locate The Light Switch
Turn The Lights Back On
Collect Data Uplink From Table To Begin
Stand next to the terminal and use the uplink
You Need To Be Holding The Data Uplink
Connection Established...
Terminal Has Been Successfully Hacked
Connection Broken - Too Far From PC
Collect ECM Mine From Table To Begin
Locate Hub And Throw ECM Mine Onto Hub
ECM Mine Has Been Placed Incorrectly
ECM Mine Has Been Placed Correctly
Collect Eye-Spy From Table To Begin
Locate Info Room PC and Holograph It
Info Room PC Successfully Holographed
Lights Have Been Re-activated
Collect Door Decoder From Table To Begin
Use Decoder On Door Pad To Unlock It
You Need To Be Holding The Door Decoder
Decoder Attached. Initiating Cracking Routines..
Decoding Complete. Door Has Been Unlocked.
Collect Tracker From Table To Begin
Locate IR Scanner Using Tracker
IR Scanner Has Been Successfully Located
Collect IR Scanner From Table To Begin
Locate Secret Door Using IR Scanner
Secret Door Has Been Successfully Located
Collect XRay Scanner From Table To Begin
Find Hidden Switches To Shutdown Laser Grid
All Laser Grids Have Been Deactivated
Collect Disguise From Table To Begin
Fool Someone Into Giving You Cloaking Device
Cloaking Device Successfully Retrieved
Laser Grid 1 Has Been Deactivated
Laser Grid 2 Has Been Deactivated
I'm Here To Pick The Equipment
Go away Joanna, you don't fool me!
Here you go. Don't drop it now.
Cloaking Device Has Been Secured Successfully
You're Meant To Use The Disguise, remember?
You'll Have To Try Harder Than That Joanna
Joanna - Where Did You Spring From?
You Have Been Detected By The Camera
Collect Cloaking Device From Table To Begin
Use Cloaking Device And Locate Carrington

I think we can safely say you're training
is now complete!
Mission Accomplished - Device Training Complete!
Mission Failed - You Have Been Detected

Select The Uplink
- Hold A
- Use Analogue Stick To Change Selecion
- Highlight Data Uplink And Release A

Select The EyeSpy
- Hold A
- Use Analogue Stick To Change Selecion
- Highlight Eye-Spy And Release A

Select The Night Vision
- Hold A
- Use Analogue Stick To Change Selecion
- Highlight Night Vision And Release A

Select The Door Decoder
- Hold A
- Use Analogue Stick To Change Selecion
- Highlight DoorDecoder And Release A

Select The X-Ray Scanner
- Hold A
- Use Analogue Stick To Change Selecion
- Highlight X-Ray Scanner And Release A

Select The Disguise
- Hold A
- Use Analogue Stick To Change Selecion
- Highlight Disguise And Release A

Select The IR Scanner
- Hold A
- Use Analogue Stick To Change Selecion
- Highlight IR Scanner And Release A

Select The Tracker
- Hold A
- Use Analogue Stick To Change Selecion
- Highlight Tracker And Release A

Select The Cloaking Device
- Hold A
- Use Analogue Stick To Change Selecion
- Highlight Device And Release A

Select The ECM Mine
- Hold A
- Use Analogue Stick To Change Selecion
- Highlight ECM Mine And Release A
Joanna, It's good to see you.

Come with me Joanna.
I'll walk you to the training room.
The information centre is through this door.
In here we have the device lab.
This leads to the simulant training room.
This is the firing range Jo.
This corridor leads down to the hangar.

HOVERCRATE
Press B next to Hovcrate to grab it...
Press B when crate grabbed to release it.

HOVERBIKE
Double Tap B next to Hovbike to ride it...
Double Tap B when on Hovbike to dismount.

OPENING DOORS
Press B next to door to open it.
B will also activate any object nearby.

ELEVATORS
Press B next to door to call elevator.
Cannot Exit While Training Is In Progress
Switch Code 1 Has Been Obtained.
Switch Code 2 Has Been Obtained.
Switch Code 3 Has Been Obtained.
Switch Code 4 Has Been Obtained.

LOOK UP
- Press Down C To Look Up At The Target.

LOOK DOWN
- Press Up C To Look Down At The Target.
Holoprogram 2 Has Been Completed Successfully.
Holoprogram 4 Has Been Completed Successfully.
Holoprogram 5 Has Been Completed Successfully.
Guard Has Been Successfully Disarmed.
Guard Has Been Successfully Knocked Out.
Disarm This Live Target If You Can.
Knock Out This Target - Stealth Is The Key.
and the final guard....

DUCK
- Hold R Then Press Down C To Duck.

CROUCH
- When Ducking, Hold R Then Press Down C To Duck.
Holoprogram 3 Has Been Completed Successfully.
Activate All The Switches.

Activate All Of The Wall Switches.
- Be Quick, As They Will Quickly Reset.

Get The Access Codes By Examining Terminals.
- Use The Codes On The Wall Terminals.
Code 1 Has Been Obtained.
Code 2 Has Been Obtained.
Code 3 Has Been Obtained.
Code 4 Has Been Obtained.
Training Failed - You Must Face Forward.
Holoprogram 1 Has Been Completed Successfully.

Unarmed Combat - Knock Out The Target.
- Press Z repeatedly to punch.
Now Try Against A Moving Target...
And Finally Against A Target That Fights Back.
Defeat All Enemies Without Getting Hit.
Training Failed - You Have Been Hit.
Holoprogram 6 Has Been Completed Successfully.
Holoprogram 7 Has Been Completed Successfully.

TERMINALS
- Press B next to terminal to use it.
Now Activate The Red Terminals On The Wall.
